entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:37 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.1°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 09:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 09:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
